title: My Account password was reset due to "Suspicious activity"
body: Today, when I try getting on league, I couldn't log in, so I decided to reset my password. When I got on my email, I noticed an email saying that my account was doing suspicious activity so my password was reset. I did nothing wrong and I don't know what happened. So What does this mean?

replies.body: It's good to change your password regularly in general, so it's solid that you took that step.  First, I recommend using our[ emails from riot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games) guide to make sure that the email was legitimate.  With your password reset, I also recommend going over our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to make sure that your information is secure in and outside of league.  I hope that helps!
Riot are a bunch of idiots, that's all.
